title: Prickly Roses
overview: Three poor women and friends from childhood work at a rose flower farm and they suffer the harsh working conditions, poor wages and sexism at work

casts.name: Hellen Lukoma as Nankya Eleanor Nabwiso as Nazziwa Sarafina Muhawenimana as Kezia Bareija Collins Emeka as Drake Johnmary Sekimpi - Bonny
